description.p: P.S. Notes is a simple plain-text note taking app designed to work with similar minimal plain-text note taking mobile apps All notes are saved behind the scenes in plain text.

ul.li: Easily create, delete, and archive notes
Manage any number of notebooks and switch between them any time
See simple markdown syntax highlighting as you type, and even apply markdown styles with familiar keyboard shortcuts
You control your files - You can easily manage your notes files in order to sync them and access them from a mobile device
Support for subfolders within notebook folders
